name: Mini Pepper Corn Muffins
ingredients: 2 Tbsp each red, green peppers, diced
instructions: In a small skillet, saut√© peppers in oil for 5 minutes or until tender; cool slightly.
In a bowl, combine the cornmeal, flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda and salt.
In a small bowl, whisk the egg, buttermilk, butter and peppers until blended.
Stir into dry ingredients just until moistened.
Fill the paper lined mini muffin cups 3/4 full.
Bake at 425 for 6-9 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean.
